alert.note: Alert for Adams; Decatur; Taylor (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 9:13PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Decatur, Adams and northwestern Taylor Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 913 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Villisca, or 10 miles north of Clarinda, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Corning around 935 PM CDT. Lake Icaria around 945 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Davis City, Pleasanton, Grand River, Corning Municipal Airport, Cromwell, Carbon, Nodaway, Van Wert, Garden Grove and Weldon. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Iowa.
